Fugai, while transformed in her werewolf-form, can produce a loud howl that is strong enough to destroy objects and wound enemies. Fugai seems to collect energy from her [[Stone of Gelel|Gelel stone]] into her throat before emitting the powerful howl.

[[es:Aullido de Fugai]]
[[pl:Wycie Fugai]]
